entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Static fields in interfaces should cause the compiler to emit `beforefieldinit` on the interface #69413
  • Better codegen for conditional-access + pattern checks. #69411
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34004.299 #69408

Closed

  • Formatting for stackalloc as a parameter lost one indentation #65498
  • Improve places where CS1661 is reported #69322

PullRequests

Created

  • Support converting arrays, whose elements are assigned afterwards, to a collection expression. #69415
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to recommend updating stackalloc expressions to use collection expressions. #69414
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Simplify .Kind() checks in the IDE layers. #69409
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extract collection-expression creation code into its own helper type. #69407
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Format stackalloc initializers like array initializers. #69410
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Move from LanguageVersion.Preview to LanguageVersionExtensions.CSharpNext #69399
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve location that lambda errors are reported at. #69334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add LanguageVersion for C# 12 #69383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement lambda params with modifiers without type name #69273
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Exceptions.ThrowEFail() should always be thrown. #69288
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Prototype of a public API (though currently internal) for roslyn features to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Add custom project contexts endpoint #69374
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implementation for Regex QuickInfo Provider and it includes documentation for Regular Expressions. #69405
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
